title: Open sesame: Dubrovnik
creator_credit: Joe O'Brien and United Nations Television
brief_description: Dubrovnik lies at the centre of Yugoslavia’s tourist development which stretches for over a hundred miles of sea coast. The United Nations representative works to preserve the natural wild beauty of the Adriatic Coast and the man-made beauty of the ancient white stone buildings and monuments.
